nodes.text: Nolo was a mercenary employed by the Trade Federation around the time of the Invasion of Naboo.

At some point in his career, Nolo became acquainted with mercenary Vana Sage. Sage would later go to work alone. In 32 BBY, the mercenary group Nolo belonged to was hired by the Trade Federation to kidnap Queen Amidala of Naboo. The group was unable to capture the Queen. Soon after their failure, Nolo led a group of mercenaries sent by the Federation after a new target: Vana Sage. Nolo exchanged words with Vana, but showed no hesitation in attacking her. Nolo failed to kill Sage, and she destroyed all the starfighters he brought with him, including himself.
Nolo was a pilot. He flew a Dianoga starfighter in his fight against Vana Sage.
Nolo appears on one level of the video game Star Wars: Starfighter. Destroying his ship is not necessary to beat the level, but it is required for a gold medal on that level.
